mapper.select: select ST.STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , SUBSTRING_INDEX(STORE_LOCATION, ' ', 2) STORE_LOCATION , STORE_CATEGORY , STORE_DETAIL , ifnull(LIKE_COUNT, '0') LIKE_COUNT , '5.0' STORE_SCORE , '10ëª…' STORE_REVIEW_COUNT , SI.PHOTO_NAME from STORE ST LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO, count(STORE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST group by STORE_NO) LL ON ST.STORE_NO = LL.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN STORE_IMAGE SI ON ST.STORE_NO = SI.STORE_NO WHERE SI.PHOTO_TYPE = 'SU1' ORDER BY STORE_SCORE DESC, LIKE_COUNT DESC limit 8;

select ST.STORE_NO , ST.STORE_NAME , ST.STORE_CATEGORY , ST.STORE_DETAIL , ST.STORE_SCORE , (select count(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST where STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO) LIKE_COUNT , SI.PHOTO_NAME from STORE ST LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO , group_concat(case PHOTO_TYPE when 'SU1' then PHOTO_NAME end) PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE='SU1' group by STORE_NO) SI ON ST.STORE_NO = SI.STORE_NO where STORE_NAME like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_CATEGORY like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_DETAIL like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') ORDER BY STORE_SCORE DESC, LIKE_COUNT DESC;
select count(*) from STORE where STORE_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_CATEGORY like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%') or STORE_DETAIL like concat('%',#{searchInput},'%');

select ST.STORE_NO , ST.OWN_NO , ST.STORE_NAME , ST.STORE_TEL , replace(ST.STORE_LOCATION, ' ', '+') STORE_LOCATION , ST.STORE_CATEGORY , ST.STORE_DETAIL , ST.STORE_INFO , ST.STORE_PLUS , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_ST, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ST , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_ET, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_ET , ST.STORE_RT*100 STORE_RT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_BTS, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_BTS , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ST.STORE_BTE, '%H%i'), '%H:%i') STORE_BTE , if(ST.STORE_LO = '0', ST.STORE_LO,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(LPAD(ST.STORE_ET - (ST.STORE_LO*100), 4, '0'), '%H%i'), '%H:%i')) STORE_LO , ST.STORE_RST , date_format(timediff(STR_TO_DATE(STORE_RET, '%H%i') , STR_TO_DATE(STORE_RST, "%H%i")), '%H%i') TIEMDIFF , ST.STORE_CLOSE , ST.STORE_SCORE , (select count(LIKE_NO) LIKE_COUNT from LIKE_LIST where STORE_NO = ST.STORE_NO) LIKE_COUNT , SI.BA1 , SI.BA2 from STORE ST LEFT JOIN (SELECT STORE_NO , MAX(CASE WHEN PHOTO_TYPE = 'BA1' THEN PHOTO_NAME END) AS BA1 , MAX(CASE WHEN PHOTO_TYPE = 'BA2' THEN PHOTO_NAME END) AS BA2 FROM STORE_IMAGE GROUP BY STORE_NO ) SI ON ST.STORE_NO = SI.STORE_NO where ST.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select ME.MENU_NO , ME.STORE_NO , ME.MENU_NAME , FORMAT(ME.MENU_PRICE, 0) MENU_PRICE , ME.MENU_HIDE , ME.MENU_INFO , SI.PHOTO_NAME from MENU ME LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO , PHOTO_TYPE , PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE LIKE 'ME%') SI ON (ME.STORE_NO, ME.MENU_NO) = (SI.STORE_NO, SI.PHOTO_TYPE) where ME.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO};

select SE.SEAT_NO , SE.STORE_NO , SE.SEAT_NAME , SE.SEAT_USETIME , SE.SEAT_MIN , SE.SEAT_MAX , SE.SEAT_CONTENT , SE.SEAT_OC , SI.PHOTO_NAME from SEAT SE LEFT JOIN (select STORE_NO, PHOTO_TYPE, PHOTO_NAME from STORE_IMAGE where PHOTO_TYPE LIKE 'SE%') SI ON (SE.STORE_NO, SE.SEAT_NO) = (SI.STORE_NO, SI.PHOTO_TYPE) where SE.STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} ORDER BY SEAT_NO;
select SEAT_NO , STORE_NO , SEAT_NAME , SEAT_USETIME , SEAT_MIN , SEAT_MAX , SEAT_CONTENT , SEAT_OC from SEAT where STORE_NO = #{STORE_NO} and SEAT_NO = #{TABLE_NO};
